message: do i need a depency? it does not work
author: modnoob

posts.message:
I had the same issue, if you are using a locale different from English try this: https://github.com/leinardi...

I got issues parsing float with Italian locale since we use commas to separate decimals instead of dots.

BTW I made a PR to fix the problem also on the main repo: https://github.com/Ulaunche...
posts.author: Roberto Leinardi
